characterDescription:
Ghenna is a scribe at the Grand Indicium in Yeddaw.
Lift has requested of Ghenna that she call her "Your Pancakefulness" when addressing her.
Shortly thereafter, Ghenna states that the scribes of Yeddaw take the secrecy of their clients very seriously.

characterDetails.Appearance:
Ghenna is described by Lift as being fat. She thinks the scribe needs three shiquas to cover her. Either that or a shiqua made for a horse.
The scribe wears spectacles and keeps her face covered, despite being in lands that know Tashi. Her shiqua covers her body completely, including her face.
Once Ghenna pulls down her face wrap, Lift sees that she is pretty and a lot younger than she'd assumed.
characterDetails.History: Ghenna intercepts Lift while she is trying to get into the Grand Indicium, and initially doesn't believe that Lift is a friend of the Prime Aqasix. She changes her mind on this after the Prime Aquasix sends a spanreed to Yeddaw, instructing the scribes there to listen to what Lift says. Ghenna then goes on to assist Lift in contacting the Prime Aqasix via spanreed on a few different occasions.
